::Scyther/Killfest::

Scyther looks at the scanners, randomly scanning the planet. He was
very bored. He thought that they would attack the Trainers or someone,
but that never ended up happening.

His eyes narrow as he sees a blimp on the scanners, recognizing it
instantly. He activates his comm, sending a message to his commander.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
In the conference room, Killfest turns to Darkfate and DrillBit.
"Scyther detected some bots that were with Hell Beast before heading
for the Maximal base. I suggest we attack these bots. From the last
battle we'd been to, I'm pretty sure that they're not friendly to
either Zardus or the Maximals, so we won't piss any of them off."

He was ready to go, and eager to slag his enemies.



--- In nbwrpg@y..., KSLawdogg@c... wrote:
> Vehement/Sun Crusher/Reflector/Shockwave/Unitron/Firestarter/Double
Punch/
> Manterror/Injector:
> 
> 
> 
> Unitron looked around, still amazed he was alive.
> 
> "We need to attack the Cybertronian Fire quickly." Shockwave
intoned.
> 
> "You mean Zardus." Unitron stated.
> 
> "Zardus is at the Cybertronian Fire, attacking those who wish to
harm the 
> Maximals." Vehement explained.
> 
> "We must move quickly if we are to catch him and his allies off
guard." 
> Firestarter said, looking to his fellow Neo Decepticons.  
> 
> "Then let's go." Shockwave ordered, transforming to his space
fighter mode 
> and launching off, the other Neo Decepticons following him.
> 
> Vehement looked to his fellow Brotherhood members and lifted off the
ground, 
> following the Decepticons with Sun Crusher and Reflector following,
somewhat 
> reluctant to leave the Chaos-Bringer alone.
